item.title: Bad Luck or Risk of Failure Should Never Stop You
item.description: Setting the scene> Setting the scene # Watched a TED talk on the biggest factors why startups succeed. Here are a few important comments: Luck and Failure> Luck and Failure # Yes, timing isn’t within your control.
